description:
NBS client error count alert for ycloud's iconostasis
https://nda.ya.ru/3VnQWd
name: [PROD][MYT] NBS Client Errors

expression.checkExpression: (other_errors_sum >= other_errors_threshold && count(other_errors) > 0) || (fatal_errors_sum >= fatal_errors_threshold && count(fatal_errors) > 0) || (throttle_errors_sum >= throttle_errors_threshold && count(throttle_errors) > 0)
